name: Claustrophobic Typist
description:
A typing game where the person typing is claustrophobic, and the longer you take to write a word the smaller the room shrinks.

Disclaimer: We have tried to remove all profanities from our word list, however a few may have slipped through. If you notice any we would appreciate it if you could let us know in the comments.

Getting it Done Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Please post your high scores in the comments!
